item.description:
This month's topic will be "unconventional uses of WordPress." WordPress is being used in some creative ways. Some are viewing it not just as a CMS, but as an application development framework. WordPress has been used for digital signage, ebook publishing, game development, project management and more.

This meetup is for developers, designers, end-users and site owners.

Knectar Design's offices are on the third floor in Suite 354. Follow the WordPress Meetup signs.

Refreshments of the beer and pizza kind will be offered. A small donation of $3-5 is suggested to help cover expenses.

Notes from last month's meetup can be found at:

http://www.valleywp.org/april-2013-meetup-recap-wordpress-svg-graphics/

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: 2013 May Valley WordPress Meetup
